title: Hefner
content:
hey guys. im somewhere around the end of this screen font ive been working on. please pile comments on me!   
some chars arent finished: WXYZxz23TSv.   
im very uncertain about my solution to the lc s- look closely and youll see it has a strange structure- is is legible? same goes for the lc e.   
   
 ![Hefner](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415090302im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/2794.gif)
author: seg

comments.content: please say something, theres no conclusion i can extract from silence..

I can think of a few...   
   
Seriously, this seems well executed (or well on   
its way). But I'm pressed to think of a good use   
for it, which makes it hard to comment   
constructively.

I think this design needs to be in a larger point size to really flourish.   
   
hhp
